heading: Hakanâ€™s Refuge Dungeon Guide
content: Hakan's refuge is a fairly straightforward dungeon to clear, although the first zone may have you backtrack slightly to retrieve the Ancients Statues. You can rush the second zone to find the priority targets and the dungeon ends immediately after killing the third Matriarch. With no boss and fairly tame mob types, this dungeon is a decent option to farm. Your first clear will reward renown and the Barbarian-exclusive While every dungeon has a somewhat randomized layout, there are patterns to where objectives and bosses are located. This map will help you identify those layouts so you can complete dungeons faster and maximize your XP and loot per hour! Reviewed by
